name: GCP Kubernetes Engine Clusters web UI/Dashboard is set to Enabled
description: This policy identifies Kubernetes Engine Clusters which have enabled Kubernetes web UI/Dashboard. Since all the data is being transmitted over HTTP protocol, disabling Kubernetes web UI/Dashboard will protect the data from sniffers on the same network.
searchModel.query: config from cloud.resource where cloud.type = 'gcp' AND api.name = 'gcloud-container-describe-clusters' AND json.rule = 'addonsConfig.kubernetesDashboard does not exist or addonsConfig.kubernetesDashboard.disabled is false'
recommendation:
1. Login to GCP Portal
2. Go to Kubernetes Engine (Left Panel)
3. Select Kubernetes clusters
4. From the list of clusters, choose the reported cluster
5. Click on EDIT
6. Click on Add-ons
7. Set 'Kubernetes dashboard' to Disabled
8. Click Save
